attributes.action: Regulate estate Agents so that they are not allowed to value or employ anyone to value a property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reason more house prices rise exorbitantly is that estate agents usually arrange the valuation of the selling property. This is not a fair and just act, as it is biased due to them having a vested interest in the price of the property as the greater the price the bigger the fee they make.
I propose legislation be made so that valuations have to be sort by the seller independently of the estate agent and that the average of 3 valuations be made. Also a flat fee be introduced so that any corrupted valuations be kept and regulated to a minimum.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
